website_summaries.verdict: These universal mountain bike pedals can help you ride comfortably on a wide range of surfaces.
pros: spindle to help optimize riding comfort and efficiency
Each pedal weighs less than 1 lb
Light and smooth compared to many similar pedals
cons: May require extended-length Allen wrench for installation
Tend to be slippery when wet

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and poor design
customer_reviews.text: If you want a dope looking pedal that feels terrible order these. Pedal is poorly designed. The center hump of the pedal is higher than the sides (front to back) causing your foot to ride on the center and not distribute the weight or fully engage the cleats. Very uncomfortable even for short distances. Pedal looks good but I’m returning mine. They are sold as a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: replacement make sounds on the left side as well
customer_reviews.text: The left side pedal cemes out a clicking sound while biking. I have to request for a replacement . So hopefully this is just an single case. The replacement I got remains a clicking sound on the left side. the bearing still get the problem. It actually gets worse after a week. this bike is brand new and doesn't have this sound when using a different pedal. I completely give up now
customer_reviews.author: Francis Liang

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, not as free spinning as I would like.
customer_reviews.text: These things look really good on my bike. The metal studs hook in well with most sneaker's soles (and will tear the heck out of your shin if you are silly enough to let it get to close to them). I do miss the toe clips I have used since I was a teenager but I will get used to not having them in time. My one complaint is that they don't spin freely. While it doesn't make the ride much different I would think it is taking up a little bit of energy with its resistance that should be making it the ground..
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: Good for hard bottomed shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I like these alot they are a great cheap alternative to the 100 dollar metals pedals. That being said these are not for hardcore off road mountain biking and are not meant for that as their pins will not eat through your shoe soles, I use them on my track bike or my commuter road bike, my racing road bike has clipless. My only issue is that if I wear soft shoes like say boosts or something soft when Im putting down power I can feel the rod in the center of the pedal because it doesn't have a flat top. If I wear skating shoes though this is not an issue. So I would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Balskibop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect...!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my new Bulls electric trekking bike. I wanted a platform pedal that my shoe would stick to without the giant (deadly) pins that are on my mountain bike. I love these. And the red spindle is the perfect touch of color to go with the accents on the bike without being gaudy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Noonan

customer_reviews.title: Good first impressions
customer_reviews.text: Pedals came in good condition. They were easy to install. On my first ride they worked well with my cycling shoes. They gripped the soles very well. I also did some power cycling at the bottom of my power stroke and they again gripped well. I haven't smashed them into anything so I can't speak of the toughness. So far I have no regrets, They work slightly better than the CrankBros 50/50 pedals they replaced. The bearing were shot in those pedals.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas N. Marsteller

customer_reviews.title: Maybe for a unused bike
customer_reviews.text: They look great. Spin awsome. Have had on my bike for a few weeks now and now the right one is making a clicking noise every time I peddle. There is a piece in the center that does not rotate anymore. I use these on a mountain bike I actually use for mountain biking. Safety first. May need to change. Don't know how reliable they are going to be. So 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: martin rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: bad for cycling shoes
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not for hard bottomed shoes. I switched from spd pedals to these and popped the cleat covers onto the shoe for a nice flat surface, but after stepping on some moist grass it was like pedaling on ice it was so slippery. On your average tennis or running shoe they may work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Left peddle started clicking within first mile of usage
customer_reviews.text: Purchase product based on decent reviews and appearance. The peddles appeared to be well made. Nail grips worked well. Within my first mile of green level single track trail riding the left peddle started clicking. After mile two the clicking was enough to be easily felt through my shoe. There was an extreme amount of movement and play in the peddle after I stopped. The right peddle had play, just not as pronounced. I am returning the peddles for credit.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Could feel the axel more than the flat form part of the pedals
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but it feels like the axle is larger than the the spikes. When I ride I feel the axle more than the actual pedal flat forms.
customer_reviews.author: BennyC.

customer_reviews.title: Rock Bros is the bomb!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the wide surface area of these pedals. It makes for a more stable ride, especially with my 5/10 biking shoes which grip the studs on the pedals like glue. The only ding I can give them is the way they attach to the crank. It’s done using an Allen wrench rather than a bike crank wrench.
customer_reviews.author: PJTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Holding up to Clydesdale usage!
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth, durable, grippy and looks awesome! Not sure what the complaints are about regarding the axle being too wide. For my use it perfectly aligns the ball of my foot with the axle, thus providing more efficiency and power transfer by eliminating foot flex. Installation is a piece of cake. Unlike other brands, it uses an Allen Wrench vs an Open-End Wrench. Proper installation method pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Like 'em!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty light. And seem fairly strong. Really helped me get my foot in just the right position while recovering from a broken ankle. I can ride without pain! After my ankle heals I'm probably going to leave them on -- I like them. Color availability is lacking, though.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo

customer_reviews.title: Good budget friendly pedals.
customer_reviews.text: Good so far. Rode two days in a row single track riding. They seem plenty grippy and smooth. I plan on commuting in the snow and slush so we'll see how the hold up to the salt and sand of Minnesota.
customer_reviews.author: J-Rod1983

customer_reviews.title: Needed peddles and got PEDDLES!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Completely blown away!! I prefer the older mountain bikes and my last pedals not the dust. I never had a pedal I needed to replace. These looked good online, but they look better in person. Easy to install. If anything changes on these, I will write another review. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: backwoodzboy

customer_reviews.title: Light weight the pegs are great for gripping souls of shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I got theses there was one review that showed pictures of the pedals all bent out of shape.This was after hitting rocks on a down hill trail! Not made for rugged terrain they are lightweight aluminum and are great for my commuting to work daily. Good value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Elrabin

customer_reviews.title: Great pedals
customer_reviews.text: I like how wide they are. They provide good grip and they are light weight
customer_reviews.author: Holly Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: Ive had these for about 2 years, they have a great grip, I have never slipped once, they are light weight, look cool (add a little color to an otherwise boring grey bike) They are a great pedals for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mc

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Custom Touch
customer_reviews.text: They make for a very striking appearance - and a little larger than I expected. Note to shade-tree bicycle mechanics: these do not have the usual flat surfaces where you can apply a pedal wrench. For any tightening or loosening you have to use vise grips - or channel lock pliers.
customer_reviews.author: TheClosetMarxist

customer_reviews.title: I like that they had color options
customer_reviews.text: So I wasn't sure about these pedals but I can say they are honestly one of the nicest set of pedals I bought. They are light and smoother rotating then the Specialized pedals I bought for my bike and they were cheaper. I bought the black and red pedals. I like that they had color options, easy install and they fit my feet fine, there isn't anything funny about them they have good grip. I mountain bike and I have already rode these pedals through some mud and haven't had my foot slip off. I really enjoy these pedals.
customer_reviews.author: Kody

customer_reviews.title: Great pedals for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great pedals for the price... AS an AK amputee I ordered these pedals because I had a hard time keeping my foot on the plastic ones that came with my bike.. Since I've added these flat pedals I feel that my foot has better grip and is not kicked off the pedal as much. Granted I'm still learning to ride with my prosthetic leg but these pedals have helped tremendously in the short time I've had them. Not to mention they look great as well!!! Happy riding!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bang for the Buck!
customer_reviews.text: These peddles are very light weight and well made. I’ve been using them for two months and they are great! Good looking and simple design make it easy to take apart and clean if needed.
customer_reviews.author: tpski83

customer_reviews.title: Metal pedals for pedal pushing
customer_reviews.text: Product is light weight and has good grip on the shoe. Seems sturdy as well. My last pedals (PDX D10’s composite) literally fell off while riding and they were stripped so I decided to go with something metal.
customer_reviews.author: Don Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Top quality for a really good price. My favorite combo.
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Look great, perform great, and they don’t shred my shins and whatever other bare skin comes in contact with them. The pins are not sharp but give you a great grip to them. I have big feet and these pedals have a perfect platform for my size 11’s.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Really grips your shoes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pedals. I use mine for all Rod of mountain biking e.g. flowing single track, pump track, enduro, etc and they have yet to fail me.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Great pedals.
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence about buying these. Much better than the stock plastic pedals. Keeps your feet on the pedals very well.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Smooth as butter light pedals
customer_reviews.text: These pedal went on a Specialized 6fattie, they are smooth and light as a feather, much better than the stock ones. Recommend to all who want to upgrade but don't want to pay the high end price.

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as they look.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible design! After just a few month of trail riding the thin aluminum bridge from front to back of the pedals had warped. I cut that part off to keep using the pedals.
customer_reviews.author: slickerthanslick

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The pedals are well-machined, easy to install and for the moment, durable. And to be honest, they look REALLY sick on my Red Trek 7.2fx Update! 1500 miles later and these are still like new!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great pedals for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great pedals. Very large size with good spikes to keep feet on pedals no matter what shoes you’re wearing
customer_reviews.author: jdemw

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Broke on the first ride. Cheap alloy was used something of higher quality wouldn’t of snapped like this. I’m extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced solid flats
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to temporarily replace my eggbeater clip-less pedals to make my mountain bike more accessible for my niece and nephew during a family camping trip. The pedals seem well built, yet light weight, bearings are smooth and the snappy blue color looks cool. No issues and that is what I tend to want in a set of pedals!
customer_reviews.author: C-light

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these pedals. I almost died when the pedal snapped off. The stem design allows for too much tork and pressure to be placed on the stem which is not strong enough to hold it. I would stay away from these
customer_reviews.author: adidas a3 axiom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: So far so good at about 100 miles, I ride hard too ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: all good
customer_reviews.text: for my road bike look a little big , but i like them a lot. fit my feet good and no slip.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Width covers entire foot
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable sturdy platform. Studs provide good grip even when wet. Double the size of the original Trek pedals that were replaced and they look sharp on the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great looks and work well.
customer_reviews.text: My new Specialized Crossroads 2.0 came with flat plastic pedals which didn't have enough grip when wet. These little jewels with their blunted nails and good looks really felt good on my first ride with them this morning.
customer_reviews.author: Logmark

customer_reviews.title: Dope
customer_reviews.text: I would buy again these pedals believe it or not brought life to my bike and it looks newer and everyone that has noticed tell me “I like them Pedals” and always asking where I got them from.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Pichardo

customer_reviews.title: Have used these pedals now enough to enjoy the wide surface area and gripping action of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used these pedals now enough to enjoy the wide surface area and gripping action of the studs. My feet don't slip off or move around on the pedal. I recommend these for off road users and hard on road use.
customer_reviews.author: BCP

customer_reviews.title: 100% Recomend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight. Feels very stiff at first but once ridden and factory grease spreads out they are perfect!! Very grippy. WEAR SHIN GUARD'S if you have a history of pedal slips!!
customer_reviews.author: cory grove

customer_reviews.title: nice peddles
customer_reviews.text: Nice peddlers. Not quite machined to perfection but good enough for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Installed May 4th broke July 1st
customer_reviews.text: super grippy and they look awesome , worked great for almost 2 months then the left one broke not sure why but if you're a heavier rider then I'd have to say pass on these as I only used them on my commuter they never even saw a trail
customer_reviews.author: Mariochavez

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but needs better quality inspection.. >>> FOLLOWED THROUGH WITH REPLACEMENT.. Very Satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: Good looking with a BIG EXCEPTION, delivered in poor build.. the outer hexagonal spline bolt looks over cranked and stripped.. upon leaving a review with photo of defect ROCKBROS followed through with a replacement..
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Slippery When Wet
customer_reviews.text: These seem well-built but as was noted in other reviews, the center spindle sticks up into the plane of the pedal surface, largely ruining shoe grip, which is almost dangerous in the wet. I took mine off and have them as spares.
customer_reviews.author: D-Train

customer_reviews.title: Not for wet conditions
customer_reviews.text: Bearing spindle to high. You can really tell when you have wet souls. Slippery when wet.
customer_reviews.author: SirWilliam

customer_reviews.title: Iv had them on my second bike for a while ...
customer_reviews.text: Iv had them on my second bike for a while but the middle makes them feel weird. middle higher then the spikes. i tried to remove pedals to put on my old one sand there is no wrench spot from the outside. i sprayed with a penetrating oil to break loose easier. only way to get them off is with an allen key 6mm. i tried to break lose and it striped then hex key in the pedal. now i have no idea how to get it off so im probably stuck with it for a while...
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nice pedals.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my extra bike that I use to ride around with my kids, so I wouldn't have to put on cycling shoes every time we went outside. These pedals look nice, feel good and sturdy, and rotate nice and smooth. Very pleased with them for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: FISHTAIL

customer_reviews.title: They are light and have good grip. will keep them on until I decide ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these when I left my bike shoes at home on our beach trip. Have been using them ever since. They are light and have good grip. will keep them on until I decide to take a long enough ride
customer_reviews.author: Malik

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wear on and off the bike.
customer_reviews.text: This is a starter unit for mountain biking. Easy to use with shoes labeled 5/10. Quick release and easy to walk in. [
customer_reviews.author: Attribution

customer_reviews.title: Great Pedals
customer_reviews.text: Great pedals, great weight reductions, good service and prompt delivery!!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Zef

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Installed them on my MTB and have worked up to the task. Love that you can replace the clevis on them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Feels like riding on a bolt
customer_reviews.text: Feels like riding on a bolt. The center is much wider than the bases so all you feel is the center.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: These pedals look and feel great. I am not a big fan of clip-ins I had them but are not really for me. These pedals are solid and keep me locked in.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy....Seriously
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these unless your going to use them on a Fat Bike w Boots. The pins are super slippery, don't grip at all. I have purchased other Rockbros pedals - and loved them. These are worse than the garbage plastic ones that come stock....
customer_reviews.author: Denis Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Never loose footing no problems so far works great on my 2019 gt aggressor comp.
customer_reviews.author: Christmas

customer_reviews.title: O man these peddles are amazing smooth and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: O man these peddles are amazing smooth and Beautiful. this is what you call an upgrade. if you thinking about getting them do it just do it they are well worth every penny plus.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Carter

customer_reviews.title: Pedal wrench not required
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift, they look durable and the red is a great accent color. Installs w the screws and hex driver provided.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: way better pedals than stock
customer_reviews.text: Way better than stock pedals that came with my bike. Spikes grab into my rubber soled shoes good enough, but don't damage the shoes. I would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: frog

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Smooth berings and great quality, I use them on my trek marlin 6, and the extra foot space is very useful. All in all, I'm very satisfied for the price, heck even if I had spent more.
customer_reviews.author: John F.

customer_reviews.title: feet slide
customer_reviews.text: middle bar it too high, feet slide around like crazy. if you raise the studs they don't stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Very wide
customer_reviews.text: Much better than stock that came on my e bike
customer_reviews.author: Jesse D

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and durable
customer_reviews.text: They are very durable and have awesome quality and great gripping
customer_reviews.author: Brian Davolt

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, Affordable and Effective!
customer_reviews.text: Great Look! Great Feel! I immediately removed my original pedals off my 2010 Trek 3500 series 3 and put these on. Many compliments at work. Packaging was perfect. Individually wrapped in bubble wrap. Would recommend to anyone looking for an instant upgrade from plastic. Many colors to choose from. Would have liked to get a sticker in the packaging so I could have promoted Rock Bros brand on my car!
customer_reviews.author: Master Dispatcher

customer_reviews.title: Good craftsmanship and grip for the cash.
customer_reviews.text: Great feel and grip. Felt really good quality and solid outta the box. No slipping off these bad boys.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Galindo

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping feet in proper position
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of these pedals. I keep my right foot in position with the pedals. I wish I had purchased them a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: wpguro

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and strong
customer_reviews.text: Love the pedals, nice a strong and light. They have great traction as well! Would buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Meisenheimer

customer_reviews.title: Eye Catching Hotness
customer_reviews.text: They feel grippy and high quality. They look amazing! Couldn’t be happier! Update: One of the pedals broke after 4 months of hard riding. Would still bump up to 4 stars if I can get them to replace the busted pedal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good pedal, poor customer support
customer_reviews.text: I like the pedals but one of the end caps came off and since that is part of keeping the pedal structure intact I needed a replacement part. Customer support is not very good nor responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: solid made, no issues since purchase with plenty of use.
customer_reviews.author: jeannette

customer_reviews.title: Love RockBros !
customer_reviews.text: Love the way my feet don’t slide off of these pedals
customer_reviews.author: Joe Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pedals for the money, easy to install...no pedal wrench needed. Definitely no slipping and came with extra replaceable teeth
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and light with great grip, have them on my singlespeed
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Niber

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bough the pedals September 2019 and the right pedal broke May 2020. I contacted the company and they quickly sent a replacement set of pedals. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Dean Kovacs

customer_reviews.title: Great price and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Love the new pedals. Super light with excellent traction. Would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking to upgrade their bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good pedals
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, lighter than nor.al for all the weight weenies. Has a nice and wide platform.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I like em a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like em a lot. I'll be buying more for other bikes. I picked up the red and wish I also picked up black for another bike.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Walker

customer_reviews.title: Good  product
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product the pedals are nice and wide for my feet and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and performance for larger feet. Size 12 USA
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 12 USA mens shoe. Very comfortable. My shoes grip great. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW SCHWAGER

customer_reviews.title: They look good and are well made
customer_reviews.text: They look good and are well made. The bearings are very smooth. My one grip is the center shaft is a similar height to the nails. I sometimes feel that my foot slips a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Todd L.

customer_reviews.title: Look awesome on bike
customer_reviews.text: Easy on your feet, use on my hybrid bike fxs5.
customer_reviews.author: son duong

customer_reviews.title: Super value for high quality competent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grip and pedal feel when applying power. Look great, light weight.
customer_reviews.author: beersma

customer_reviews.title: Pedaling is extremely smooth - the difference was immediately evident ...
customer_reviews.text: Pedaling is extremely smooth - the difference was immediately evident. Besides the bearings, the larger pedal area and longer spindle, together with the studs, gave me greater confidence in staying on the pedals when on rough surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: James McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Seller
customer_reviews.text: Seller delivered item as stated and delivered on time. Bent these pedals on my first outing when I pedaled over a rock. Nice pedal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: T_Dogg

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LOOKS! SUPER SMOOTH
customer_reviews.text: GREAT LOOKS! SUPER SMOOTH! GRIPY! I CAN FEEL THE MIDDLE SECTION BUT DOESNT HURT MY FEET! TOO WIDE FOR MY ROAD BIKE! PERFECT FOR MY MOUNTAIN BIKE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: awesome pedals, im a big guy and thought it wont handle me when i went out on the trails! good grips!
customer_reviews.author: Marky M.

customer_reviews.title: Love the wide platform and how thin they are
customer_reviews.text: Love the wide platform and how thin they are. Liked them so much I bought a second pair for my wife. She is also very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Damon De Frates

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS!!! however, very grippy! Be careful.
customer_reviews.text: Okay. So I love and hate this product. I love that it looks freaking awesome.... I hate that it cuts your leg open.... I'm not sure what to say other than in addition to buying this product, buy some kevlar leg/achilles heel protectors at the same time. I slipped of the pedal when I thought I was safe in assuming I had great grip, however, I found after slipping off the pedal, i impaled my leg so bad that I almost needed stitches.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: They look nice and well built but are heavy and don't spin ...
customer_reviews.text: They look nice and well built but are heavy and don't spin freely well. Bought them for my road bike.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: thanks for great pedals without going clipless, nice-n-light for my thoroughbred.
customer_reviews.author: superman

customer_reviews.title: Great Pedal
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to replace my stock plastic pedals. Great product and great price!! Would definitely purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sealed bearings and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Sealed bearings and super light. Looks good on gt sensor.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Right pedal, wrong color
customer_reviews.text: The pedals look and feel great BUT you sent me the wrong color.
customer_reviews.author: SJMS

customer_reviews.title: but a good improvement in stability and overall comfort and performance
customer_reviews.text: Wider pedals than my originals, but a good improvement in stability and overall comfort and performance, those 4 bearings give a smooth feel at a more than decent price. I ride 20 miles a day ×6 days by 3rd day I finally overcame fear of breaking them climbing hills and really stood on them no problem I'd buy them again just for the COOL FACTOR of the looks.
customer_reviews.author: Kitcheninja

customer_reviews.title: They looked nice while they lasted
customer_reviews.text: These broke within a month of purchasing them... we weren't even mountain biking, just pedaling down the streets of Chattanooga TN. They looked nice while they lasted.
customer_reviews.author: lori lane

customer_reviews.title: Very,very disappointing:(
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing got the pedals last week , not even 20 miles later they are clicking and clacking . I don't ride in the woods or do any sort of technical riding , just ride around town on the streets. Very,very disappointing:(:(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ROCKBROS Advanced 4 Bearings Mountain Bike Pedals Platform Bicycle Flat Alloy Pedals 9/16"
feature_bullets: SMOOTH AND NON-SLIP: Advanced 4 lubricated sealed bearing,anti-skid nails design for better grips
STABLE:Aluminum Alloy material and Cr-Mo spindle possess durable composite pedals
EASY INSTALLATION:L for left pedal, R for right pedal
UNIVERSAL:Stardard 9/16 inch spindle,platform pedal for long ride comfortable and pedaling efficiency

LIGHTWEIGHT: 0.82 pounds weight improve your riding experience,suitable for old school, cycle cross bike, dirt jumper, folding bike, mountain bike, road bike - touring, track bike, unicycle, urban bike - fixed gear

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
